page.title: 12Farming in Pennington.
page.content: My name is Doreen. I live on Walthwaite farm overlooking the village.Our farm is over 100 years old. My grandad owned our farm first. It is a mixed farm.It has cows,sheep, hens,dogs,cats and two horses that don't work.My mum,dad and me work on the farm.Sometimes a man called Evan comes to help when we are busy.Today I got up,dressed and washed and got the cows in.I tied them up and started milking.Then I helped my mum feed the calves then had my breakfast.After that I went on my horse to see my friend.Later I had my dinner,played for a bit. Then we got the cows again and milked them.Later I had my tea,watched tele for half-an-hour and got my nightie on.Next I had a wash and brushed my teeth and went to bed.
